text: Mickaël Wolski (born 5 March 1979 in France) is a French retired footballer who last played for Bergerac Périgord in his home country. ==Career== Wolski started his senior career with Guegnon in the late 1990s. In 2005, he signed for Stockport County in the English Football League Two, where he made twenty- three appearances and scored two goals. After that, he played for Moulins Yzeure Foot, AC Arles-Avignon, Sporting Club Toulon, and Bergerac Périgord before retiring. == References == == External links == * Football: Wolski aims to be Distin with shout * Casper chases French ace * Match preview: Stockport v Boston * Foot National Profile * at Footballdatabase.eu * at Soccerway * corse football! title: Mickaël Wolski
